name: Big data DBA
description:
Playtika is looking for a top talented Big Data Infrastructure Engineer to join a growing team and work on a diversity of data technologies.

We provide all data infrastructure needs for the ML, BI and Marketing departments at Playtika.

Day-to-Day work will include:

  • Hadoop cluster installation and maintenance
  • Write Ansible playbooks
  • Monitor our technological stack with ELK* and Grafana.
  • Design and implement an infrastructure that will allow stakeholders to easily set up, operate and use various distributed systems (Hadoop, Vertica, Kafka, Presto and more).

Requirements:

  • At least 2 years experience as a Hadoop administrator
  • Good knowledge in Linux
  • Experience with Python and/or Bash.
  • Experience working with production distributed data pipelines.

Preferred qualification:﻿

  • Hands-on experience in Linux internals and performance tuning - Linux sysadmin is an advantage
  • Knowledge and experience in JVM languages Java/Scala/etc.
  • Cloudera administrator certification

What are we offering?

  • Competitive salary, performance-based bonuses and flexible working hours;

  • Social package, including gym membership compensation, medical insurance with dental coverage;

  • Paid vacation and sick leaves;

  • Training programs, certifications, conferences including international events;

  • Corporate English classes;

  • Referral program;

  • Corporate celebrations, team buildings, and fun activities;

  • Free meals twice a day, refreshments, happy hours;

  • Technical library with option to order books;

  • Coaching and reviews to support your career development;

  • Working for one of the top social gaming companies in the world.

Come play with us!
